full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement
## BPM021450 Quest Toad Software

### Information

* **Solicitation Number:** BPM021450/26588
* **Publication Date:** May 24, 2024
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2:00 PM EDT, June 5, 2024
* **Category:** Government Services - Information Technology
* **Trade Agreements:** World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO-AGP), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement (CColFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement, Canada-United Kingdom Trade Continuity Agreement, Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP), and Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services

### Description

Shared Services Canada (SSC) has issued a Request for Proposal (RFP) for the provision of Quest Toad Software. The RFP is open to Canadian businesses who wish to quotation this procurement. A trade agreement is not required. SSC is seeking responses that meet specific requirements.

### Contact Information

If you have questions or require additional information, please email [tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca](mailto:tenders-offres@ssc-spc.gc.ca). Suppliers can also access the solicitation on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GCWeb).

### Important Deadlines

* **Tender Closing Date:** 2:00 PM EDT, June 5, 2024
* **Proposal Submission Guidelines:** Suppliers are not required to submit a proposal. This is a request for quotation only.

### Accessing the Solicitation

The solicitation is available on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GCWeb) at [https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public](https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/rfp/request_browse_public). You may also access the solicitation by searching the solicitation number (BPM021450/26588) or by entering the words "BPM021450 Quest Toad Software". Suppliers may inquire or submit emails to [tenders-offres@ssc-s
